"A.D.2028/4/21/19:30": "Hey, Kohri! Don't go blowing your nose with my clothes!"
"Wait! You're doing this on purpose, aren't you?! Why you little...! Get! off! of! meeee!"
"Good grief. The mood is completely different than it was a few minutes ago."
